clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in hyperlipidemia

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: MB07811 s TR beta receptor selectivity and liver targeting could harness the efficacy of the approach while avoiding extra hepatic activation of TR alpha and TR beta receptors that may lead to therapy limiting side effects These benefits may include reduction of LDL and total cholesterol Reduced liver and serum triglycerides reduced Lp a and enhanced clearance of liver fat
